growth.title: Growth Charts
growth.subtitle: Growth charts consist of a series of percentile curves that illustrate the distribution of selected body measurements in children.

cdcrecomm.title: CDC recommends that health care providers:
cdcrecomm.who: Use the WHO growth charts to monitor growth for infants and children ages 0 to 2 years of age.
cdcrecomm.cdc: Use the CDC growth charts to monitor growth for children age 2 years and older.
cdcrecomm.moreinfo: For more information, please go to
